sentences.sContent: Then she asked if it could be hooked up to a video game.
sentences.sContent_eng: Then she asked if it could be hooked up to a video game.
sentences.sCn: 然后她问我是否可以把它悬挂起来设计成一款视频游戏。

sentences.sContent: We have a deal where if he behaves well at church, I take him to Blockbuster and let him pick out a movie or a video game.
sentences.sContent_eng: We have a deal where if he behaves well at church, I take him to Blockbuster and let him pick out a movie or a video game.
sentences.sCn: 我们在那做了一个交易，他表现的像在教堂一样--我带他去百视达然后让他自己选一部电影或者一个电视游戏。

sentences.sContent: Or when users watch the trailer for an upcoming video game, they want to know when it will be released and where they can buy it.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or when users watch the trailer for an upcoming video game, they want to know when it will be released and where they can buy it.
sentences.sCn: 又或者当用户在观看一个将要上市的视频游戏的预告片时，他们想知道该游戏的发布时间以及到哪里购买。

trans.tranOther: a computer game in which you move images on a screen using electronic controls
